Name: Boombox

Powers: Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved Deceptive Shots - All units in army are able to shoot into flank or rear of units that are in combat. These wounds count towards that unit's combat resolution this turn. Multishot 3 - Ranged attacks roll 3 dice. Volley Fire - Can fire ranged attacks over other units. Manoeuvrable - May turn once at any point during a move or hustle

Name: Court Poisoner
Powers: Wretched Poisons - Units that takes one or more poison wounds from a friendly unit must roll to flee with a -1 penalty. If the unit is in combat, it makes this roll at the end of turn. Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved Virulent - Any unit wounded by this unit becomes Poisoned. At the end of each of the controlling players turns, Poisoned units take a wound on a 4+ with no armour saves allowed.

Name: Mistress of Whispers
Powers: Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved Pull Strings - Action: Swap the position of two friendly facedown units Mage - Can cast two spells a turn

Name: Handmaid
Powers: Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved Another's Bidding - When casting spells, this unit may select any friendly unit as the origin of a spell Mage - Can cast two spells a turn

Name: Broodmother
Powers: Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved Center of the Web - Gain +1 attack for each adjacent friendly unit Virulent 4+ - Any unit wounded by this unit becomes Poisoned. At the end of each of the controlling players turns, Poisoned units take a wound on a 4+ with no armour saves allowed.

Name: Crowcaller
Powers: Vengence - When this unit blocks in combat, it still takes 1 wound. The unit that attacked takes 1 wound as well. Mage - Can cast two spells a turn. Bloodspells - While this unit is wounded, gain +1 to casting. Uncanny Protection - Block may not be reduced beneath 5. Protective Markings - When this unit blocks due to Vengence, it does not take a wound.

Name: The Brewer
Powers: Vengence - When this unit blocks in combat, it still takes 1 wound. The unit that attacked takes 1 wound as well. Cauldron - When Vengence triggers on an adjacent friendly unit, it does 2 wounds per block rolled. Uncanny Protection - Block may not be reduced beneath 5. Protective Markings - When this unit blocks due to Vengence, it does not take a wound.

Name: Executioner
Powers: Vengence - When this unit blocks in combat, it still takes 1 wound. The unit that attacked takes 1 wound as well. Multiwound 2 - Each hit does 2 wounds to a single model. Killing Blow - Before each round of combat, you may choose to forfeit any number of attack dice. Each die forfeited increases Multiwound by 1.

Name: Raidleader
Powers: Vengence - When this unit blocks in combat, it still takes 1 wound. The unit that attacked takes 1 wound as well. Aggressive Flanking - When a friendly unit moves into the flank or rear of an enemy, do 1 attack per model hitting on 4+. These count towards who won combat. Master of Movement - Friendly units may turn 90 degrees after moving. Uncanny Protection - Block may not be reduced beneath 5.

Name: Battleboar
Powers: Vengence - When this unit blocks in combat, it still takes 1 wound. The unit that attacked takes 1 wound as well. Buck Wildly - Whenever this unit deals a wound through vengence, deal it to all adjacent enemy units. Manoeuvrable - May turn once at any point during a move or hustle

Name: Master Sapper
Powers: Mechanics - At the start of your turn, heal 1 wound on an adjacent construct. Battlefield Prep - During deployment, instead of placing a unit, place a mine on any empty square on the battlefield. The first unit to enter that tile takes d6 attacks hitting on 2+ with AP2. Sensibly Entrenched - Enemy units that move adjacent to this unit are disrupted. Each model in the unit takes a wound, hitting on that unit's block score. Landbreaker - Free Action: Once per game, place an obstacle in range 2 that blocks movement and shooting. Multishot 2 - Ranged attacks roll 2 dice. Fire on the Move - Can shoot after moving

Name: Gatebreaker
Powers: Construct - Immune to fear checks while adjacent to a mechanic. Dies if it flees. Four Arms - Wields two sets of weapons. This unit performs a round of attacks with one set of weapons, then a second round of attacks with a second set of weapons.

Name: The Warforger
Powers: Mechanics - At the start of your turn, heal 1 wound on an adjacent construct. Coppersmith's Upgrade - After deployment, replace one equipment on any unit with any other piece of equipment of that type. Show your opponent the type. The unit does not need to be able to equip an item of that tier. Custom Tools - Can equip two weapons. Their effects stack.

Name: Crackshot
Powers: Mechanics - At the start of your turn, heal 1 wound on an adjacent construct. Riflemaker - All ranged weapons in the army gain AP1. Entrench - Units that move adjacent to this unit are disrupted. Each model in the unit takes a wound, hitting on that unit's block score. This affects friendly units as well. Multishot 3 - Ranged attacks roll 3 dice. Long Range - All ranged weapons gain 1 range.

Name: The Zeppelin
Powers: Construct - Immune to fear checks while adjacent to a mechanic. Dies if it flees. Flying - This unit can move over other units and obstacles. Airborne - Melee attacks against this are at -1. Natural 6s still always hit. This unit may always move out of combat. Bomber - If this unit moves over an enemy unit, do d6+1 attacks hitting on 5+ with AP1. Multishot 2 - Ranged attacks roll 2 dice. Fire on the Move - Can shoot after moving Firing platform - This unit can shoot from the front, flank or rear.

Name: The General
Powers: Officer - When a ranged attack targets this unit, you may nominate an adjacent friendly regiment as the target instead. General's Banner - All friendly units get a bonus of 1 towards who won combat. General's Spirit - Other friendly units in the same combat as the general get a +1 bonus to melee attacks.

Name: Commando
Powers: Officer - When a ranged attack targets this unit, you may nominate an adjacent friendly regiment as the target instead. Fearful Presence - Enemy units in range 2 subtract one from rolls to flee. Natural 6s still always pass. Multishot 3 - Ranged attacks roll 3 dice per model.

Name: Archmage
Powers: Officer - When a ranged attack targets this unit, you may nominate an adjacent friendly regiment as the target instead. Uncanny Protection - Block may not be reduced beneath 5. Mage - Can cast two spells a turn Old Knowledge - The first spell cast each turn gets +1 to cast

Name: Wyrm Prince
Powers: Officer - When a ranged attack targets this unit, you may nominate an adjacent friendly regiment as the target instead. Flying - This unit can move over other units and obstacles Manoeuvrable - May turn once at any point during a move or hustle Natural Breath Weapon - Bonus attack: Once per battle, before attacking as normal this unit may use a breath weapon. This unit rolls an attack for every model in the enemy unit, hitting on 5s.

Name: Sharpshooter
Powers: Officer - When a ranged attack targets this unit, you may nominate an adjacent friendly regiment as the target instead. Spotter - Once per turn, reroll a friendly unit's missed ranged attack dice, or a friendly warmachine's special attack dice. Multishot 2 - Ranged attacks roll 2 dice. Long Range - This unit's ranged weapons gain 1 range.

Powers: Rock Lobber - Ranged Weapon - Range 4, AP -2, Multiwound 3.
